column4: so my video card and the xorg in 12.04 don't play well together... opinions for what I should do?
downgrade to 11.10, or switch to debian...
got an ati card I'm guessing?
what do you use your computer for?
can't get either version to activate now
? what have you blacklisted, do you have an xorg.conf or an xorg.conf.d in /etc/X11
this says that nvidia isn't installed
it says "compatible" x driver not found... perhaps the one installed is not
I don't see where it installed the kernel driver
were you the one I was helping the other day?
